channel.title: Timeline on Jedi Archive
channel.description: Recent content in Timeline on Jedi Archive

item.title: The Force Through the Ages: A Timeline of Jedi Philosophy
item.description: Jedi thought didn’t evolve out of enlightenment—it adapted out of necessity. Taryn Vox maps how their view of the Force shifted from order to survival to something resembling clarity.

item.title: Complete Star Wars Legends Timeline
item.description: An exhaustive reading order of Star Wars Legends (Expanded Universe) novels — all 427 entries, chronologically arranged with Amazon and Bookshop links.
